Home / Work /

Treelife

Treelife

This was a case study I designed during my first few weeks as a UI Design student. I worked with design methodologies, foundations and content modelling.

I first defined my problem, then i put the idea onto paper before i started designing digitally on Adobe Xd. Lastly, prototyped it.

Key takeaways from this case study is, the importance of colors, hierarchy and how to structure the content.

Category

Web App, Desktop App

Role

UI Design, prototyping

Prototype design
